# 2. MinMaxScaler , fit_transform 사용
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler

df = pd.read_csv('../input/mtcars/mtcars.csv')

sc = MinMaxScaler()
df['qsec_sc'] = sc.fit_transform(df[['qsec']])

#1
answer = sum(df['qsec_sc'] > 0.5)
print(answer)
#2
answer = len(df[df['qsec_sc'] > 0.5])
print(answer)

# 3. scaler 직접 만들기 (def)
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('../input/mtcars/mtcars.csv')

def minmax_sc(data):
    scaled = (data - min(data)) / (max(data) - min(data))
    return scaled

df['qsec_sc'] = minmax_sc(df['qsec'])

answer = sum(df['qsec_sc'] > 0.5)
print(answer)
